title: Is She Wrong For Calling Out Her Friend For Doing Something Unethical?
description:
Her friend's husband recently accepted a temporary job that's three hours away from where they live. Because of this, he moved into an apartment that's close to the job.
Here's the problem: His wife doesn't trust him, so she installed cameras around his apartment to spy on him!
